alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:14PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Dale and northeastern Coffee Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 214 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Rucker, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds near 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Level Plains, Ariton, Dill, Hooper Stage Field, Gerald, Mabson, Arguta, Dale County Lake, Marley Hill, Phillips Crossroads, Hwy 231 Pea River Bridge, Greater Salem Church, Skipperville, Dean Church Road, Lowe Army Heliport and Roberts Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
